name: MailNavigator Mail Box Archive
summary: Learn about .MBA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You most likely will only encounter a MailNavigator MBA file if you use the MailNavigator program to send and receive emails or manage personal information. To open an MBA file in MailNavigator, select File â†’ Load External Mailbox..., select "MailNavigator archives (*.mba)" from the "Files of type" dropdown menu.
